description:
Large 1bdrm. in charming Astoria- amazing neighborhood! 3 minute walk to NQ trains- 20 min ride to Times Square.  Complete with washer/dryer in unit with 2 A/Cs to escape the summer heat.  Comes with a loving lap kitty to keep you company for your stay!

Washer and dryer in unit 
Shampoo/ Soap
2 ACs 
Cable/wifi

Check in & check out & any emergencies

Quiet, family oriented, lots of amazing variety of cuisine

NQ train line 2 min walk away

I do have a cat that needs some love and care while I am away
I do have all guest sign a contract with me
name: 1 Bedroom Apt All Yours In Astoria!
review: Bekah was easy to communicate with and was more than helpful with getting us acquainted with her place. The location was very convenient and we couldn't have asked for a better value for our stay.
